nodes.text: The MX-05 Constructor Droid was a model of four-legged construction droid used by the Shroud, a freelance spy active during the Galactic War. An MX-05 Constructor Droid repurposed as a battle droid was among the forces guarding B-NK1's base in the back room of the Dealer's Den cantina on Coruscant.

An MX-05 Constructor Droid appears as an enemy in the Republic macrobinoculars mission "The Shroud's Gambit" in Rise of the Hutt Cartel, the first Digital Expansion for the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
